Articles.Content:
So I'm loading KSP.

First hint is "Locating Jeb Kerman."

Then the next thing: "Motivating Kerbals".

Heh! I had this image of the KSP staff finding Jeb, then bringing him to the Kerbonaut building to give a wild-eyed, enthusiastic talk to the crew. . . . .

Ever had a funny combo?
I had "Treating Kessler Syndrome...", then "Locating Jebediah Kerman..." a few times. I imagine it as if Jeb was riding a rocket to clear up debris, then him suddenly disappearing.
I had no idea they were random. Plus it takes so long to load I usually do something else while it does its thing.
I cant see those loading hints since a while back, is there any option that turns them on/off, or i have messed up something?

This is a triple whammy. "Recruiting Kerbals", then "Calculating Trajectories", then "Treating Kessler Syndrome". The whole time I was thinking "Okay, so you shoot the Kerbals into space, then they explode?!?! After all that work recruiting and calculating trajectories?"
I always snigger when I get calculating trajectories followed by "Pointing correct end towards space". took someone double checking the math before they realized they built the rocket upside down.

took someone double checking the math before they realized they built the rocket upside down.

I could not help but lol at that. XD

I got

"Recruiting Kerbals" -> "Locating Jebediah Kerman" -> "Recruiting Kerbals" (again, Jeb scared them off or something maybe) -> "Pointing Correct End Towards Space" -> "Calculating Trajectories"

in order a few days ago.

The weirdest part is that I was paying attention to a loading screen I've seen far too many times to really care about

I often get "Biding time" when the loading bar is seemingly full but it has not finished loading yet. Makes me think the game is actually fully loaded already and it just wants to wait a bit before showing me the main menu.

If I'm not mistaken, the complete list of these messages is this:


Adding K to Every Word
Adding More Boosters
Answering Ultimate Question
Biding Time
Calculating Trajectories
Calculating Ultimate Answer
Clearing Launch Pad
Combobulating Discombobulator
Generating Abalation Cascade
Inventing Witty Loading Hints
Locating Jebediah Kerman
Motivating Kerbals
Overlaying Grid onto Bezier Curves
Patching Conics
Pointing Correct End Towards Space
Reaching a Safe Distance
Recruiting Kerbals
Testing Springs
Treating Kessler Syndrome
Untangling Space Tape

So instead of starting the game repeatedly, you can now make up your own combos. Such as...

Motivating Kerbals

Pointing Correct End Towards Space

Adding More Boosters

Reaching a Safe Distance

Combobulating Discombobulator

Generating Abalation Cascade

Clearing Launch Pad

Locating Jebediah Kerman

Treating Kessler Syndrome

These are the ones I had.


"Biding Time..."
"Answering the ultimate question"
"Locating jebediah kerman"
"Motivating Kerbals..."
"Clearing Launch Pad..."
"Calculating the ultimate answer..."
"Comobulating Discombobulator..."
"Treating Kessler Syndrome..."
"Testing springs..."
"Calculating Trajectories..."
"Recruiting Kerbals..."
"Generating Abalation Cascade..."

These are the ones I had.


"Biding Time..."
"Answering the ultimate question"
"Locating jebediah kerman"
"Motivating Kerbals..."
"Clearing Launch Pad..."
"Calculating the ultimate answer..."
"Comobulating Discombobulator..."
"Treating Kessler Syndrome..."
"Testing springs..."
"Calculating Trajectories..."
"Recruiting Kerbals..."
"Generating Abalation Cascade..."

My personal favorite:

"Patching conics..."

I once got "Answering Ultimate Question.... Adding More Boosters... Locating Jebediah Kerman... Treating Kessler Syndrome"

It appears the ultimate answer is to add moar boosters. And then somehow Jebediah jumped out the rocket or something and got Kessler syndrome.
I usually pay attention to which one comes up last. Like "Locating Jebediah Kerman" is a good final one.
The very first time I loaded KSP, the first hint to come up was "Pointing correct end towards space." It just seemed so right.

"Calculating Ultimate Answer"

"Adding more boosters"

"Reaching a safe distance"

...truer words never been spoken

Hey,

anyone know where those loading hints are stored? It would be fun to come up with more of them, instead of looking at the same ones all over again.

"Tightening Kan Allen-belt"

"Dropping Solar Flares"

"Polishing Heat Shields"

"Ductaping Struts"

"Storing Hitchhikers"

"Decontaminating Kethane"

"Specifying Impulse"

"booking gravitational assistance"

(If some of these or all are not witty at all, I hope I will be forgiven, since I am not a native speaker)

Regards
"Locating Jebediah Kerman" then "Reaching a safe distance" was a funny combo I just got.

Hey,

anyone know where those loading hints are stored? It would be fun to come up with more of them, instead of looking at the same ones all over again.

"Tightening Kan Allen-belt"

"Dropping Solar Flares"

"Polishing Heat Shields"

"Ductaping Struts"

"Storing Hitchhikers"

"Decontaminating Kethane"

"Specifying Impulse"

"booking gravitational assistance"

(If some of these or all are not witty at all, I hope I will be forgiven, since I am not a native speaker)

Regards

I like the idea of making our own ("Specifying Impulse" is brilliant).

I'd add:

Charging batteries

Taste-testing snacks

Calculating booster and strut sufficiency

Consulting Tsiolkovsky

Recalibrating Density Scale

Effecting Oberth

Reticulating Splines (<-- Reference to another sandbox game)

So then, can aonyone help us out with this and tell us where those loading hints can be found?. I'm afraid m programming skills do not go far enough, and I am too lazy to grep my way through all the code.

I like the idea of making our own ("Specifying Impulse" is brilliant).

I'd add:

Charging batteries

Taste-testing snacks

Calculating booster and strut sufficiency

Consulting Tsiolkovsky

Recalibrating Density Scale

Effecting Oberth

Reticulating Splines (<-- Reference to another sandbox game)

Anyway, this would be awesome!

https://p.gr-assets.com/540x540/fit/hostedimages/1380426817/853138.gif

Anyway, this would be awesome!

It's in the KSP_Data on the location of the game. Open mainData with notepad, scroll down and search around the bottom, you'll see those splashes.

I recommend you to backup the file, or don't edit the file at all. I tested to edit it. Didn't made any mistakes, when I opened KSP, ERROR happened.
I saw one sequence yesterday that amused me: untangling space tap >>> biding time >>> answering ultimate question >>> locating jebediah kerman

Yesterday, I got:

"Reaching a safe distance"

followed by...

"Motivating kerbals"

followed by...

"Recruiting kerbals"

... Yeah.

Reaching a safe distance, then trying to motivate the kerbals to do the same, and then replacing the ones that didn't make it recruiting new ones.

If someone built the rocket ship upside down, then they could just flip it over.

In order to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent universe. -Carl Sagan
